An extension of [westegg-digital-garden](/themes/westegg-digital-garden) that adds the following:

- [x] Styling and navbar from [Misk-Web](https://github.com/cashapp/misk-web/)

## Getting Started

- Try out the [demo](http://misk.westegg.xyz)
- Copy the starter from the [repo](http://repo.westegg.xyz/tree/master/starters/westegg-misk)

  ```
  git clone git@github.com:adrwxyz/westegg.git
  cp -r westegg/starters/westegg-misk new-site
  cd new-site
  npm install
  npm run-script build
  ```
